name: Solitaire 7: A quality app to play Klondike
name_original: Solitaire 7: A quality app to play Klondike
description:
We created Solitaire 7 because we believe it is time for classic games to catch up with the modern design principles introduced with the new iOS 7.

That's why Solitaire 7 is colourful, clean and concise. It comes packed with great features such as draw one and three cards modes, adaptable layouts for right and left-handed users and auto save. Solitaire 7 also supports Game Center so you can compare your best results and challenge your friends.

This is the ad-free version of the app

With Solitaire 7 you get all the following features:  

• Unlimited games
• Draw One card or Draw Three cards modes
• Autocomplete to quickly finish the game (once you solved it)
• Right and left handed layouts
• Stunning graphics
 • Easy to read cards
• Show or hide timer option
 • Automatic game save and resume
 • Drag and drop to move cards
 • Double tap to quickly send cards to foundation
 • Standard scoring system and rules
• Best score, best times and number of games won
 • Game Center leaderboard. Prove to the world how good you are!

If you have already played Solitaire on your computer, you are going to love it on your iPhone and iPod.
